select shopping_cart.*, goods.name as goodsName, goods_type.name as typeName ,goods.img as img , goods.shop_id as shopId , pet_shop.name as shopName ,goods.price as price from `shopping_cart` left join goods on shopping_cart.goods_id = goods.id left join goods_type on shopping_cart.type_id = goods_type.id left join pet_shop on goods.shop_id = pet_shop.id
and shopping_cart.user_id = #{userId} and goods.name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%') and pet_shop.name like concat('%',#{shopName},'%')
ORDER BY shopping_cart.added_at DESC
